short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live statistics of coronavirus impact in India, nationwide, statewide & districtwide.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Live Statistics of corona virus impact in India in just one click.

Summary includes total counts of confirmed, active, recovered and deceased patients across India. This allows you to view at nationwide, statewide and districtwide summary.

Statistics let you identify Highest to Lowest affected states and districts.

You can select state & district of your choice from 'Options page' to get latest statistics of covid-19 for your chosen time range.
